whyChooseUs.title: 6 Reasons to Choose Smartway
whyChooseUs.subtitle: There are many travel agencies out there, here’s what makes Smartway different!

leading.title: Best in East Java
leading.text: We are proud and grateful to be chosen as the #1 travel agency in East Java, having received the Tripadvisor Travelers' Choice awards in 2020, 2022, 2023, and 2024. We are committed to continuously improving our services, being innovative and adaptive to remain the best!

pricing.title: Legally Incorporated
pricing.text: Established in 2016, Smartway Tours has served over 200,000+ customers. Smartway Tours is under the management of PT Bagus Bahagia Bersama, a professionally managed company focused on sustainable tourism services that prioritize the local wisdom of Indonesian culture.

service.title: WOW Customer Oriented
service.text: Customers are the central point and source of Smartway Tours' services. Providing the best service according to the guests' needs is our duty. Smile, greet, and salute are the basics we provide. Next, get ready to say 'Wow!' at the service we deliver.

record.title: Professional Track Record
record.text: Smartway has become a leading travel agency brand in Indonesia and is trusted by hundreds of companies both domestically and internationally in planning their travel needs. Discover our digital track record through Google, mass media, and social media.

professional.title: BNSP Certified Professional Team
professional.text: Our entire field team, consisting of tour leaders, tour guides, and event specialists (MICE), are certified by BNSP (National Professional Certification Agency). About 80% of our team is proficient in intermediate to fluent English.

kompetitif.title: Competitive Prices
kompetitif.text: Smartway Tours offers highly competitive prices for all services because we implement effective marketing strategies, efficient operational strategies, and strong partnerships with various partners both domestically and internationally.

testimony.TestimoniDeskripsi: Let these testimonials be proof of our commitment to providing the best service for every journey.

private_tour.title: Enjoy an Exclusive Vacation with Private Tours and Custom Tours from Smartway!
private_tour.description: For those of you who want to travel but don't want to be grouped with other tour participants. You can request to take a private tour. You can also determine your travel destination according to your preferences through the custom tour service. Smartway's travel consultants will help you plan and create the best travel itinerary! With these 2 tour schemes, you will get many benefits!

1.title: Can depart anytime
1.subtitle: Yes, that's right! These 2 tour schemes allow you to travel anytime. You are free to choose the departure date!

2.title: Privacy and Comfort
2.subtitle: For your privacy and comfort, you don't need to worry because you won't be grouped with other tour participants. You can freely express yourself, maximize content, celebrate special moments without feeling awkward or disturbed by strangers.

3.title: Freedom of time
3.subtitle: You can freely determine the duration of visits at each tourist destination.

4.title: Request destination
4.subtitle: If you like hidden gem destinations that not many people know about, this tour scheme is perfect for you because you can request unique destinations according to your preferences. Sounds fun, right!

5.title: Suitable for family vacations, corporate events, fun games/office outings.
5.subtitle: Yes, more than 40,000+ guests (out of a total of 200,000+ Smartway guests since 2016) have tried this tour scheme. Now it's your turn and your loved ones, let's go!

menabung.title: Realize Your Dream Adventure!
menabung.description: Want to go on vacation but find it hard to save? Don’t worry! Smartway has a saving program for those of you who have a hard time resisting temptation and managing daily expenses that often leave you broke at the end of the month. You can register for a saving program for your next vacation to your dream destination! Join and enjoy various benefits:

1.title: Trusted and Reliable
1.subtitle: Hundreds of people have tried Smartway's trip saving program since 2016. You can check our company's legal documents and customer testimonials on Google Reviews, Tripadvisor, and social media (Instagram, Tiktok, Facebook, and Youtube).

2.title: Request saving scheme
2.subtitle: Easily and effectively manage your vacation budget. Financial planning is easy because it is oriented towards each participant's saving ability.

3.title: No interest
3.subtitle: No need to worry about interest because this program is designed to help you plan the best trip with Smartway! So we just help keep your money safe without charging any interest!
